com.jed.actor

Class AbstractEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jed.actor.AbstractEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Displayable, State, Collidable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ball, MapTile, Player

    public abstract class AbstractEntity
extends Object
implements Displayable, State, Collidable
    Abstract class whose subclasses are displayable, collidable, and contain various states. It is also composed of a position and movement vector, acceleration, and a Boundary.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    jlinde, Peter Colapietro
    See Also:
    Displayable, State, Collidable
